item.title: Death Note ~ デスノート
item.description: Author: Nathan Dodson | Contains Spoilers Introduction I’m not really sure where to start here - Death Notewas a wild ride, and I am still working through my feelings about how it ended. I always develop some kind of expectation for how a show might end, and occasionally I let myself get carried away with that hyopthetical and get disappointed with how it actually ends. I can say with certainty though that Death Note ended in the only way possible - with the death of Light.
